item.title: Miami FL - Videographer Needed for Company Video - Upwork
item.description:
MIAMI, FL ONLY

We need a videographer to come to our office to shoot a 15 minute video of our CEO. No editing will be required, but the equipment will be important.

Required Equipment:
- Professional full-frame camera
- Tripod
- Green screen
- 3 lights

Looking for a videographer with experience who can be efficient setting up the equipment and returning the raw footage to us.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 19, 2024 01:23 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Videography, Video Production, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I'm Matt, an AASECT Certified Sex Therapist with a YouTube channel dedicated to providing insightful and engaging content. Our channel promotes sex positivity and sex education to help fight shame. We are looking to grow our audience with high-quality video production, and we need a video editor who is sex-positive and open-minded.

Key Responsibilities:

Edit and assemble raw footage into polished YouTube videos.
Add music, graphics, and effects to enhance video quality.
Collaborate with the content team to meet project objectives.
Ensure videos align with the channel’s style and brand.
Optimize videos for engagement and SEO performance.
Stay updated on industry trends and editing techniques.

Requirements:

Proven video editing experience, preferably with YouTube content.
Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar software.
Strong understanding of video formats, codecs, and web video best practices.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects.
Excellent attention to detail and creativity.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Knowledge of YouTube SEO is a plus.
Must be sex-positive and open-minded.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 01:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Education
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Education
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Comedy Web Series Highlight/Promo Reel Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to create 2 highlight/promo reels for our Comedy Web Series. The reels will be used for promotional purposes to attract a wider audience and increase viewer engagement. The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing and a good sense of humor to capture the comedic essence of the series. Attention to detail and creativity are key in this role.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Creative storytelling
- Comedy content creation
- Attention to detail
- Ability to meet deadlines

This is a small project with a duration of under 1 month. We are looking for an intermediate level expert who can bring our Comedy Web Series to life through visually appealing and engaging highlight/promo reels.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 19, 2024 01:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
